name: Eliminate if combo contains mirror digits and spread > 4
expression: any(mirror.get(d, -1) in combo_digits for d in combo_digits) and (max(combo_digits) - min(combo_digits)) > 4

name: Eliminate if combo contains mirror digits and fewer than 4 digits â‰¤ 4
expression: any(mirror.get(d, -1) in combo_digits for d in combo_digits) and sum(1 for d in combo_digits if d <= 4) < 4

name: Eliminate if combo contains mirror digits and not all digits are odd
expression: any(mirror.get(d, -1) in combo_digits for d in combo_digits) and not all(d % 2 == 1 for d in combo_digits)
